definition: to open up land for cultivation

sentences.english: Historical materials of reclaim and cultivate in Kaiyuan and Mengzi district, Yunnan Province are mainly preserved in Yunnan Archives.
sentences.chinese: 雲南開蒙墾殖的史料主要保存在雲南省檔案館。

sentences.english: In the past, cultivation mainly led to activation of Korqin sandy land several times.
sentences.chinese: 墾殖也是過去科爾沁地區沙地幾度活化的主導因素。

sentences.english: We have reminded them of the circumstances of our emigration and settlement here.
sentences.chinese: 我等曾提醒其民，我移民與墾殖者之狀況。

definition: Long Xing Quan - "Dragon Fist" - Martial Art
lit. plaintive whine of geese (idiom); fig. land swarming with disaster victims/starving people fill the land
Taichung or Taizhong county in central Taiwan
loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
fig. people who cannot afford to buy their own house
a scholar or government official living in one's village/a village gentleman/squire
using the few to defeat the many (idiom); to win from a position of weakness
Xianyou county in Putian 莆田[Pu2 tian2], Fujian
